    • Method Detail

      • tie

        public static boolean tie()
        Check if the game is a tie.
        Returns:
        return true if the board has no empty cell and there is no winner; otherwise, return false

      • win

        public static boolean win(char currentPlayer,
                          int currentR,
                          int currentC)
        Check if the game has a winner. If yes, returns true; if no, returns false.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - current player
        currentR - the number of row the current player puts X or O on
        currentC - the number of column the current player puts X or O on
        Returns:
        return true if a player wins; return falls if nobody has won

      • checkWinner

        Check which player is the winner or noone is the winner.
        Parameters:
        currentR - the number of row the current player puts X or O on
        currentC - the number of column the current player puts X or O on

      • disableBoard

        public static void disableBoard()
        Disables board when game ends.
